name: breedingChamber
Perc_FAIL: You don't see anything of value
Surv_FAIL: No use for this right now
Arc_FAIL: You don't sense any specific magic
combatDesc: As you enter a room filled with cages you are spotted by 2 monstrosities and a small white rat commanding them, he squeaks orders and they charge towards you
roomDesc:
Rows of long wood tables hog most of the space in this filthy room. 
 Dozens of metal cages sit atop the tables, most containing rats of 
all shapes and sizes. The air is filled with the sound of chittering 
and the foul smell of rat droppings.
